description:
Gray and the Servant Hephaestion clash within the Child of Einnashe. However, they are engulfed in an avalanche, inevitably forcing a cease-fire. While they temporarily sheathe their weapons, they speak to each other about their ideologies about the relationship between Masters and Servants. Shishigou and Luvia find out that Trisha was investigating about the serial murders from seven years ago and about the Holy Grail War, and see the link between her and the Rail Zeppelin. As various speculations intertwine, Adashino begins to disclose her own deductions in place of Lord El-Melloi II aboard the Mystic Eyes Collection Train...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Magan Shuushuu Ressha 4/6: Houei no Magan to Mezameru Tantei
Rail Zeppelin 4/6: Mystic Eyes of Transience and an Awakening Detective
ريل زيبيلين 4/6: عينا التنقل السحريتين ومحقق مستيقظ
魔眼蒐集列車4/6 泡影の魔眼と目覚める探偵
